content: this listing is for digital patterns only do not expect a physical product this pattern is written in standard us terms to ensure easy-to-read and follow directions plus accuracy all my patterns are tested by experienced pattern testers and tech-edited be the first to know about new pattern releases sales and giveaways subscribe to my email list the pdf is designed for printing this way you can support my small business **skill level** easy **materials** caron simply soft yarn 100 % acrylic 315 yds 288 m/ 6 oz/170 1 g in taupe 345 yds 316 m weight 4 hook 4 5 mm us 7 tape measure scissors tapestry needle **special stitch** you will need to have knowledge on how to make a bobble stitch
